001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.util.Optional;
004
005/** An external module locator tries to link a module name to a remote location. */
006@FunctionalInterface
007public interface ExternalModuleLocator {
008
009  String locate(String module);
010
011  default Optional<String> find(String module) {
012    return Optional.ofNullable(locate(module));
013  }
014
015  default String caption() {
016    return getClass().getSimpleName();
017  }
018}
